name: Nine Noir Lives
description:
Welcome to Meow Meow Furrington. Capital city of cats, cartels, and crime. A city that will just as soon claw your eyes out as lick your face.
Explore the hangouts and high points of this feline furtopia. Discover characters both kooky and dangerous. Solve the mystery of a murder that threatens to spill into the city like an overturned saucer of milk and ignite a war between the powerful Montameeuw and Catulet families...
...and lick things. SO many things. Lick everything! Doors! Furniture! Books! Bars! Trains! Pavements! So many delicious and intriguing things to lick!
And definitely solve that murder, too. If there's time. After all the licking.Things about the game!Humourous point and click adventure game
Classic murder mystery but with cats!
Meet dozens of crazy characters to interact with
Visit amazing locations
Mind bending puzzles to solve
Lick icon!! Lick everything
